iti30:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco akatakalyāṇo hoti, akatakusalo, akatabhīruttāṇo, katapāpo, kataluddo, katakibbiso.
iti30:4.4: So ‘akataṃ me kalyāṇan’tipi tappati, ‘kataṃ me pāpan’tipi tappati.
iti30:4.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā tapanīyā”ti.
iti30:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
